status.description: New tasks are open by default, unless otherwise stated.

contact.description: The contact for the task. Use contact_id field to set a contact.

documents.description: A tasks can have many related documents.

assignee_id.description: User who should do the tasks.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

filter[status].title: Status
filter[status].description: A single or a list of status, comma separated: open,closed,overdue

filter[ids].title: Task IDs
filter[ids].description: Only find tasks with given ids. Comma-separated list of task IDs.

filter[contact_ids].title: Contact IDs
filter[contact_ids].description: Tasks related to given contacts. Comma-separated list of contact IDs.

filter[creator_ids].title: Creator IDs
filter[creator_ids].description: Tasks created by given users. Comma-separated list of user IDs.

filter[assignee_ids].title: Assignee IDs
filter[assignee_ids].description: Tasks assigned to given users. Comma-separated list of user IDs.

filter[due_at_from].title: From date
filter[due_at_from].description: Tasks due after the date(>=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[due_at_to].title: To date
filter[due_at_to].description: Tasks due before the date(<=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[closed_at_from].title: From date
filter[closed_at_from].description: Tasks closed after the date(>=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[closed_at_to].title: To date
filter[closed_at_to].description: Tasks closed before the date(<=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[updated_at_from].title: From date
filter[updated_at_from].description: Tasks updated after the date(>=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[updated_at_to].title: To date
filter[updated_at_to].description: Tasks updated before the date(<=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[created_at_from].title: From date
filter[created_at_from].description: Tasks created after the date(>=). YYYY-MM-DD

filter[created_at_to].title: To date
filter[created_at_to].description: Tasks created before the date(<=). YYYY-MM-DD

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 50, max is 200

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC

template_id.title: Task Template
template_id.description: Task template(id) to use. If set template fields like name, description, attachments are used for the new task.

document_id.title: Create a task for the document.
document_id.description: If set: the document, its contact and due date are used for the task. Dont forget to set a task.name though. Useful if you want to create a reminder when the document is due e.g call contact.

source.title: Copy a task.
source.description: Uses name, description, contact, documents from given given source task.
